Blackjack is a game that consists of a dealer and one to multiple players.
The rules are as followed, the dealer and the players are competing with one another to reach a card count of 21 or as close to 21 as possible. The first to do so wins, however if a player goes over 21, the dealer wins, if the dealer goes over 21, the player wins. This is referred to as a bust mechanic.
Below is a list of the variety of mechanics in blackjack.

Bust : when a player or dealer goes over the card count of 21.

Stand: keep current hand for the round.

Hit: Ask for another card.

Surrender: Half the bet is returned and the player folds his hand of cards.

Double Down: Can only be accessed after the first two initial cards are dealt. Double your bet and receive one more card, can no longer hit.
